election_record.label: Missouri 1812 Clerk of the House of Representatives

office.name: Clerk of the House of Representatives

role.title: Clerk of the House of Representatives

overview.note: "The oath of office was administered by John B.C. Lucas, one of the Territorial Judges...Andrew Scott was elected permanent Clerk before the close of the session." Switzler's Illustrated History of Missouri, From 1541 to 1877. 189.

election_record.reference: Switzler, W. F. Switzler's Illustrated History of Missouri, from 1541 to 1877. Saint Louis: C. R. Barns, 1879. 189.
